translation: Qyamt (yosh czytth vnụ̄ chhe diln haybth sintụ̄, yosh zar pavvunụ̄ chhe knn khṭr nak krykv sintụ̄)
Cze kyah vane bh suh doh kvtah mshkl chhu?
Kus chyz zanhi ravy cze kh kvtah khṭrnak chhu suh qyamtuk doh.

Yymhi doh lvukh āsn chhkrnh āmtụ̄ pvnprụ̄ hiy (yithh pạtthụ̄ pvnprụ̄ chhi aanhi gtthi mnz nar kis gashs kun smith yivan, tvpth tath nars mnz pan zalan yithe pạtthụ̄ āsn kạfr th nafrman lvukh jhnms mnz daznh khạṭrh vsụ̄ pyvan)
Byyhi āsn kvh dvnnh āmut phmb hiy (yvtan nh tim thh bah thh zmyns sintụ̄ dabh bihan)
Ps yymụ̄ sndyn nykyn hund pvtur gvb lghi yʿny suh āshi ba ayman,
Suh vathi tsly bkhsh ārams andr.
Vonụ̄ yymụ̄ sndyn nykyn hund pvtur lvthi yʿny suh āshi kạfr,
Tmụ̄ sndi rvznch jae āshi haviyh yʿny jhnmuk bnim ṭbqh.
Cze kus chyz zạnhi ravy suh haaviyh kya chuh?
Suh chhu grm krnh āmut nar. (nar chhu grme mgr suh āshi byyhi grm krnh āmut, byyhi nar zn nh āsn tath nsbt grme)
